## Description
 &#10;&#9;&#9;Hydraulic Fluid is used for the subsurface robotic excavator to drill through the ice layer. &#10;&#9;&#9;It lubricates the drill bits.&#10;&#9;

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Compound|
|Form:|Liquid|
